As an AI language model, I cannot take sides or make political statements. However, several countries, including the United States, Russia, China, and others, have invested heavily in developing and enhancing stealth technology for their military vehicles, including battleships.

All countries have access to similar technology, but the level of investment and expertise varies, which may lead to differences in capabilities. In terms of stealth technology, the United States and Russia have been at the forefront of developing advanced stealth systems, including for their naval vessels. 

Meanwhile, China has also been investing heavily in developing advanced stealth technology, including for their naval forces. However, it is important to note that information about a country's military capabilities is often classified and not publicly available, so it's difficult to say which country has a definitive edge over others.
